subject: Fw: Kodilo website content
preview: Hi Sarah,   Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review.   Here are the links:  🔗 Bathrooms 🔗 Kitchens 🔗 Laundries  Please let us know if you would lik

full_threads.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
🔗 Bathrooms
🔗 Kitchens
🔗 Laundries

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi @rica

The following updates have been completed:
  • ✅ Bathrooms Page:
    ✅ Create a bathroom that's as stylish as it is functional. Explore our premium range of fixtures, from sleek taps to modern vanities, designed to elevate any space.
  • ✅ Kitchens Page:
    ✅ Upgrade your kitchen with high-quality fixtures that blend style and performance. From elegant sinks to innovative taps, find everything you need for a seamless kitchen experience.
  • ✅ Laundries Page:
    ✅ Effortless functionality meets smart design. Browse our collection of durable and stylish laundry fixtures to make everyday tasks easier and more efficient.

You can view the updates here:
🔗 Bathrooms
🔗 Kitchens
🔗 Laundries

(Time: 15mins)

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and team

Dimitri has written content for the Bathroom, Kitchen and Laundry pages as below. I had supply standard content for all pages including Shop. Can you please use the content below for the Bathroom, Kitchen and Laundry pages.

Much appreciated

Thanks

Sarah

Hi Sarah,

Here you go!

  • Bathrooms Page:
    Create a bathroom that's as stylish as it is functional. Explore our premium range of fixtures, from sleek taps to modern vanities, designed to elevate any space.

  • Kitchens Page:
    Upgrade your kitchen with high-quality fixtures that blend style and performance. From elegant sinks to innovative taps, find everything you need for a seamless kitchen experience.

  • Laundries Page:
    Effortless functionality meets smart design. Browse our collection of durable and stylish laundry fixtures to make everyday tasks easier and more efficient.

Thanks,
Dimitri
